data.title: bd-2cn: Fix sync_from_review_logs to exclude orphans from processed count
data.description: sync_from_review_logs returned count+orphaned_count, inflating reported events. Fix: return Ok(0) when all orphaned, Ok(count) otherwise. 2 new tests.

data.reason: LGTM. Pure correctness fix â€” return value no longer inflates with orphaned event counts. No new input surfaces, no injection vectors, no path traversal, no resource issues. Tests cover both mixed and all-orphaned scenarios with projection state verification.
